1.title: The Trolley Stop Café

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: An investigation at the Trolley Stop Café, a classic Cajun-inspired New Orleans restaurant, reveals an absentee owner is to blame for the restaurant staff's lack of communication and discipline; chef Aarón Sanchez stops by to lend his knowledge.

2.title: Shanty on 19th

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Ramsay and his team work to revamp Shanty on 19th, an Allentown, Penn., restaurant that is suffering the consequences of feuds between the owner and staff.

3.title: Vasi's Restaurant and Bar

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Ramsay and his team try to revamp Vasi's, a family-owned Italian restaurant located in Waterbury, Conn., where a disconnect between the restaurant's owner and head chef inhibits any needed improvements.

4.title: Catfish Cabin

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Ramsay and his team try to revamp Catfish Cabin, a traditional Southern-style restaurant in Memphis, Tenn.

5.title: Stone's Throw

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Ramsay and his team attempt to revamp Stone's Throw, a family-owned, fine dining restaurant located on the Housatonic River in Seymour, Conn.

6.title: Bayou on the Vine

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Ramsay and his team discover that the family dynamic is creating a challenging work environment at Bayou on the Vine, a family-owned-and-operated Cajun restaurant in Kansas City, Mo.

7.title: Boardwalk 11

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Ramsay and his team attempt to revamp Boardwalk 11, a gastropub and karaoke bar located in Los Angeles.

8.title: Los Toros Mexican Restaurant

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Ramsay and his team attempt to revamp Los Toros, a decades-old Mexican restaurant located in the heart of the San Fernando Valley in Los Angeles; they discover an overworked owner who is buried in astronomical debt and battling health problems.

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

1.title: Bella Gianna's

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Gordon Ramsay travels to Congers, N.Y., where he visits a family-owned Italian restaurant called Bella Gianna's that is in desperate need of improvement.

2.title: The Old Coffeepot Restaurant

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Gordon and his team make renovations and create a fresh new menu for a failing Cajun restaurant in New Orleans in an attempt to revive it.

3.title: Brownstone Bistro

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

3.plot: Gordon Ramsay's "Hell On Wheels" travels to The Brownstone Bistro, a Cajun fusion restaurant located in Los Angeles, CA. After intense investigation and surveillance, Ramsay discovers how vital it is for the Bistro's staff to come together as a team in order to keep the restaurant afloat. Ramsay will try to bring this failing restaurant back from the brink of disaster - all in just 24 hours. Watch, as the clock ticks down and Ramsay and his team transform this restaurant with a spectacular renovation, a fresh new menu and hope for the future.

4.title: Sherman's Restaurant

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

4.plot: Gordon Ramsay visits Sherman's Restaurant in Greenville, Miss., where he and the team find that the 30-year-old restaurant needs a new head chef.

5.title: La Serenata

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

5.plot: Gordon Ramsay visits La Serenata, a family-owned Mexican restaurant in Los Angeles, CA, where he and his team discover the owner has exhausted himself in trying to keep the restaurant - and his dad's legacy - afloat.

6.title: Fetch Bistro

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Gordon Ramsay travels to Fetch Bistro, a restaurant designed to serve both people and dogs in Wichita, KS, where he and his team discover that the restaurant itself could use some major clean-up.

7.title: Patrick Molloy's

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

7.plot: Gordon Ramsay's 'Hell On Wheels' travels to Patrick Molloy's, a family-owned American restaurant and bar, located on the Hermosa Beach Pier. After intense investigation and surveillance, Ramsay and his team discover a deep-rooted family feud that has been holding the restaurant back for quite some time. Ramsay will try to bring this failing restaurant back from the brink of disaster - all in just 24 hours. Watch, as the clock ticks down and Ramsay and his team transform this restaurant with a spectacular renovation, a fresh new menu, and hope for the future.

8.title: Sandra Dee's Bar-B-Que & Seafood

episode of.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back (TV Series 2018– )

8.plot: Gordon Ramsay's "Hell On Wheels" travels to Sandra Dee's Bar-B-Que and Seafood, a laid-back bar and grill located in Sacramento, CA. After intense investigation and surveillance, Ramsay and his team discover that the owner's lack of discipline with her own family members has greatly inhibited any success for the restaurant. Ramsay will try to bring this failing restaurant back from the brink of disaster - all in just 24 hours. Watch, as the clock ticks down and Ramsay and his team transform this restaurant with a spectacular renovation, a fresh new menu and hope for ...

imdb.title: 24 Hrs to Hell and Back
plot: Celebrity chef 'Gordon Ramsay' (qv) is given one day to help troubled restaurants.
